name: Stickman Destruction
description:
Stickman Destruction
Do you like stickmans? These courageous little men with whom you can do everything, or almost.

In this game, the stickman is going to be the victim of your quest for points.

Wound, kill, explode, pierce, burst, break the stickman. Whenever you complete your mission, you open up new levels, win extra vehicles and earn points.

There are no rules to eliminate your stickman, leave your imagination free, you have carte blanche.

And if your parents tell you that the game is too violent, reassure them, with Stickman Destruction, you train for your future job: stuntman!
FEATURES :
*Graphics: clear and minimalist

*Vehicles at your disposal: skateboard, bike, motorbike, jeep, ...

*Goal: Destroy the stickman again and again

*Result: maximum points
